name: collagen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a protein found especially in the joints (= places where two bones are connected) of humans and animals collagen implant/injection
an injection of collagen into the lips or skin to make the lips appear larger or the skin appear younger and smoother: Collagen implants don't help the blemishes left by chicken pox or acne.
